    Title

    Setup_Mod_Weighting.Rd

    Title

    Setup_Mod_Weighting(
  input_list,
  sablefish_ADMB,
  likelihoods,
  Wt_Catch = 1,
  Wt_FishIdx = 1,
  Wt_SrvIdx = 1,
  Wt_Rec = 1,
  Wt_F = 1,
  Wt_FishAgeComps,
  Wt_SrvAgeComps,
  Wt_FishLenComps,
  Wt_SrvLenComps
)

    Arguments

    input_list

    List containing a data list, parameter list, and map list

    sablefish_ADMB

    Numeric indicating whether to mimic calculations for the sablefish ADMB model (1) or not (0)

    likelihoods

    Numeric indicating whether to use ADMB likelihoods (0) or TMB likelihoods (1)

    Wt_Catch

    Weight (lambda) applied to the overall catch dataset

    Wt_FishIdx

    Weight (lambda) applied to the overall fishery index dataset

    Wt_SrvIdx

    Weight (lambda) applied to the overall survey index dataset

    Wt_Rec

    Weight (lambda) applied to recruitment penalty

    Wt_F

    Weight (lambda) applied to fishing mortality penalty

    Wt_FishAgeComps

    Weight (lambda) applied to fishery age compositions

    Wt_SrvAgeComps

    Weight (lambda) applied to survey age compositions

    Wt_FishLenComps

    Weight (lambda) applied to fishery length compositions

    Wt_SrvLenComps

    Weight (lambda) applied to survey length compositions

    Contents
